messages.subject: To all the Wolfram fan -- OVA release!! Happy Birthday to GJAD! XD
messages.msgSnippet: I’m back again ! It’s been quite a long time that I posted anything …Feel too bad T____T If only I didn’t have deal with all of those
messages.messageBody:
Im back again ! Its been quite a long time that I posted anything Feel too bad T____T If only I didnt have deal with all of those examsGrrr.And miss everyone so much*hug* XD Therefore, even though my deadly final exam will begin in the next 24 hour (= my life comes to an end) I wont delay this anymore ^^
First, Shinou prompt : 1 mono fanart
http://wolframxkuma.deviantart.com/art/Possessed-Wolfram-and-Shinou-68113156
I really really really didnt satisfied with the quality of this pic (my eyes hurted badly then => have troubles with dealing with colors ) so really sorry if its not good enough T____T

Second: Wolfram-Conrad AMV
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PnkcUWkjfd8
A small gift for all the ConWolf fans in the community! Out of 3 Ive spent largest amount of time on this project, so hope you enjoy! ^^

Last but not least: Rufus prompt: 1 fanart, 2 extra fanarts depicted Little Rufus! XD
http://wolframxkuma.deviantart.com/art/Rufus-s-dream-68113723
http://wolframxkuma.deviantart.com/art/Little-Rufus-68113950
Aww..Rufus-sama is just so much love!!! If only I could read a Wolfram-Rufus ficwhat else can be better? <3
DA has already resized the pic, so the quality of Rufus s dream is a bit low. Also, I only posted one Little Rufus pic on DA, so if youd like to see the high-res ver of Rufuss dream and the other Little Rufus one, please take some time to visit my humble site ^^ I couldnt be more honored ^^
Talking about the site, it has changed and loaded with stuffs since last time, as I thought I must do somethingspecial to celebrate the OVA release plus Oct 17 was the sites Bday, so if you could visit and support the site this time, I couldnt be more appreciated (and theres a high chance that I may survive after the test XDD Thank you so much in advance! ^^)
Wolfram shrine URL: Golden Jade Azure Dream
Much love to you all and have a nice weekend
Kuma
Let's burn the passion in our Wolfram rabid girls' hearts again, o hail the OVA!!!!!



My Wolfram site: http://golden-jade-azure-dream.asuran.net
My deviant-art: http://wolframxkuma.deviantart.com
My blog: http://360.yahoo.com/okitasoujilady_1712

Die Liebe für den Wolfram halten, der stark geht! Yay!

Ewige Hingabe zum Wolfram von Bielefeld! Wenn nur ich dich eines Tages treffen könnte
